answers.answer: yes I  remember you, deb right?  I know how hard this is right now for you, your in my thoughts and prayers.
I will certainly send some thoughts and prayers her way !
I will as well.  Thanks for letting us know Jen.

I'm sorry it has been awhile since I've posted. Since getting pregnant things have been crazy. We've been dealing with layoffs at my work to one of my dogs being sick and having to see a neurosurgeon. Now this preeclampsia condition. My due date is 12/24 and we are hoping to make it at least til the end of November.Thank you all for your prayers.D:-)

christmas eve?? It could not get any better then that.. you will be fine! I just know it, and so will that beautiful baby your going to have.. I think of you often, and always watch for your posts.. I will pray for you daily
I have a very positive feeling about your baby.  I'll be sending positive thought for you and your little one!
I bet you'll get the best Christmas present ever!!I hope you and your baby are doing well.

Hey  from one mature momma to another I am sending positive vibes your way. You have made it this far my dear and you will go the distance. You are in my thoughts and prayers and I know God will take you safely through this.I can't wait to see pictures of you and your beautiful healthy baby boy.Here's to ya!!!!!!! Lots and lots of HUGZZZZZZ

I JUST went through the exact same ordeal, so even though I don't believe we've ever corresponded before, my prayers and thoughts are deifinite with her. I went in at 30 weeks and made it to two days shy of 34. She can do it!!!!

Okay - another update - MM got released from the hospital yesterday & is doing great!  She's going to bi-weekly appts w/her doctor to make sure everything's okay so hopefully these babies will 'cook' a little longer.  Prayers were definitely answered - jen
All my prayers are with you,I just know you are going to have a wonderful christmas present this year!! Hold on.it's going to be ok!

I pray for continued wellness for your baby and you.  Always remember God is bigger than anything you are going through.  If you surrender all to him, he will bless you with what you need.  Strength, Wisdom, and Peace that passes all understanding!God Bless,Preciouspg

Blessings of God to you and your soon to be baby!I am on my 6th day of post embie transfer and the 2ww is the hardest thing in the word.I pray for you and everyone our age trying to conceive-God Bless,SassyFaith
i am praying for you and your baby...

question: Some of you might remember mature momma.  She's been a member of both the fertility and this forum since 2007.  Anyway, she finally got pregnant last March and is now having terrible difficulty w/pre-eclampsia and is now in the hospital trying to make it to 35 weeks (and maybe longer).  She's been communicating w/me through pm's and I wanted to request prayers for her.  She's a very sweet woman and even though she hasn't been active a great deal since her pregnancy, please pray for her that she and her baby boy make it a little longer.I know she'd love to hear from any of you through pm or on this post - thanks so much!! - jen
title: mature momma
